pros: If space is limited, this narrow end table is a good choice
Construction is solid and the table is easy to assemble
24 inches wide by 12 inches deep by 24 inches high
cons: Wood coloring is more even than it is marbled

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy, for under $800-$1000
customer_reviews.text: I'd been shopping for a coffee table for years, seriously. I was prepared to pay for the "right" one, but within reason, and was finding nothing at all unique or stylish, and sturdy, for under $800-$1000. Many of them are just too big, the smaller options tended to be cookie cutter, or cheaply made. This one is sturdy, solid, easy to assemble and is really quite beautiful. The bottom shelf adds storage space/functionality, and the slate inlays are really pretty, adding a subtle but stylish element. Did I mention sturdy? This thing is solid wood and heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: American made furniture from Sheboygan Wisconsin
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I have been looking for a small size lamp table for some time and this is just what I wanted. Leick furniture is American made in Wisconsin. I feel it is important to buy America made products when they are available. This furniture line makes smaller pieces of furniture at a reasonable price. I like that there are several colors to choose from in lighter browns. I also like that the table is made out of real wood. It is sturdy and well made. I like the way it looks in my living room. I think I will be buying more furniture from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: 48ccm

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not rustic
customer_reviews.text: Assembeling the table was almost effortless with simple and straightforward instructions. On a hardwood floor the table rocks a bit, not quite level. Where it lost points in the rating was due to the rustic claim. Cheap stained pressboard.was tacked to the inside of the table. The color scratches off easily on the 'rustic' inserts. This also means the table is not solid wood. Can only blame myself for buying a made in China product. It would have been a better product without the faux inserts. The wood was stained nicely and overall construction had no major defects.
customer_reviews.author: The Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: We received this table yesterday and assembled the legs/lower shelf in about 15 minutes...easy assembly. As with all furniture, the unseen side is a bit "rough" looking with one edge being significantly rougher than the others but again that is out of sight when the table is in the upright position. Joint cuts are perfectly square and there were EXACTLY enough fastener parts (no extras). It is a VERY sturdy table and has enough weight to suggest it is well built...not flimsy or cheap materials. The slate "inlays" are attractive and already mounted so no assemble required for those parts. My wife & I are very happy with this table so far.
customer_reviews.author: gsownsby

customer_reviews.title: Economical, High Quality On-Line Furniture --- Yes, it is Possible!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of the Wedge End Tables and one Coffee Table from this Rustic Oak Slate Tile product line. Very pleased with this company. I wish all on-line “flat-pack” furniture could be this good. Top-notch packaging, quality materials, excellent fit and finish, quick and easy assembly ... at a surprisingly economical price point. Honestly, if you have ever purchased furniture on-line ... you will be thrilled with this product line. I have not included photographs, as the photos included in the item description are quite representative and accurate. Finally, without reservation, and enthusiastically I give these folks --- 5-Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased one of these in January, and noted ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these in January, and noted at the time that it was as another reviewer commented......the slate was not as variegated as the listing photo portrayed. There was SOME difference in the pieces, so I was okay with it. But on getting the second one recently, the slate has only gotten worse....no variegation at all.....just muddy gray & black. Thank goodness they will not be within sight of one another. In fact, Amazon should take down the listing photo, as it is TOTALLY MISLEADING.
customer_reviews.author: leilanicohani

customer_reviews.title: THREE TABLES, NO ISSUES.
customer_reviews.text: This is the last of the three that I bought, only started out to get the small end table, ended up with the triangle and coffee table too. Easy assembly , no odor in any of mine as some others had reported. Sturdy and durable. Very pleased with product, would buy again Shipping was timely and as stated, in fact I think I received all three tables a couple days before the estimated delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Z.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Perfect especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, came in great shape and just the right size although I thought in the beginning that it wasn't long enough it really is ideal for our couch. I did get some slate that had some variation in color but most of them are very dark in color. Seems very sturdy and looks good. I just wish that the bottom shelf wasn't laminated and that they used real wood. For the price I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: Love this Line of Furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of the slate inset pieces of furniture and I am so happy to have added this table! It's well made and sturdy. Came well packed (box had a couple of damaged areas but the table was well protected). Put it together by myself in less than 10 minutes. Fits perfectly in the space where I wanted it to fit. Slate is variegated earth tones of brown and gray. I thought the slate insets were only across the front but there is a piece of slate on each end as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Halloween Queen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Table!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic table!! We have a small area due to our oversized couch. This beautiful table was just what we needed. The table is sturdy and I love the slate! I have a small lamp on vintage books, a 5x7 framed picture and a plate with LED candles on it. The table makes this vignette just perfect! The bottom shelf has a long, wooden sign and several framed pictures. This lovely piece may seem small but when I started decorating it, it really holds a lot without being overwhelming! I highly recommend this great piece. This was my second purchase from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a to clear some space on my 21" x 47" desk that was too small for two computers and a phone and the Leick Chairside swing arm lamp table did the job. It was narrow enough to fit in the space previously occupied by a floorlamp and provides sufficient light while making space on the desk by holding my caption phone at an ideal height. Added to this the bottom shelf accommodated the multi plug serge protector thus eliminating s tangled wiring mess on the floor. Was easy to assemble and I like the light the lamp provides better than the harsh light that the floor lamp t replaced provided.
customer_reviews.author: Cl

customer_reviews.title: Not slate but cheap looking plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Leick Rustic wedge table. The first table had real slat inserts and was pleasing to look at with its various colors and detail in the slate. The table I received today the build quality is still outstanding but the cheap ass plastic substitute for the slate was a huge disappointment and unacceptable. I am not going to return the table but I am going to remove and replace that cheap slate substitute with something more pleasing to the eye and my scenes of ascetics. SHAME on you Leick, I thought you where a Cracker Jack organization now you are just the toy in the box.
customer_reviews.author: L. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Yes ... Economical & High Quality "Flat Pack" furniture is Possible.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of the Wedge End Tables and one Coffee Table from this "Rustic Oak Slate Tile" product line. Very pleased with this company. I wish all on-line “flat-pack” furniture could be this good. Top-notch packaging, quality materials, excellent fit and finish, quick and easy assembly ... at a surprisingly economical price point. Honestly, if you have ever purchased furniture on-line ... you will be thrilled with this product line. I have not included photographs, as the photos included in the item description are quite representative and accurate. Finally, without reservation, and enthusiastically I give these folks --- 5-Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this table. It compliments other furniture with slate tile that we already had, and brought more grey into the mix, which helps pull the colors of our new couch & loveseat into the overall room decor. It took me about 15 minutes to assemble, by myself, and the parts fit together well - no extra tools needed; just the hex key that came in the box. It's nice that it also comes with extra bolts and washers, just in case. It's very sturdy and just the size we needed for our small room. Considering buying another to put by our couch
customer_reviews.author: Kerin Esco

customer_reviews.title: Very good value and well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: I build furniture and have to say that for the price this a really good value. I think the added distressing is a little too mechanical but the piece still looks good. It looks like the factory these are built in has good fixtures as the parts are square and true. Everything is a good fit and it’s sturdy. Eight Allen bolts and your done. About 15-20 minutes. A pro tip is not to tighten the legs fully until you get the bottom shelf in place. You will need a little play since the shelf is a tight fit. Once it’s in place tighten everything up.
customer_reviews.author: FooBar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and has a charming
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and has a charming, slightly worn feel to it that brings warmth and character to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table but as others have stated in their reviews, the slate inserts do not have the color displayed in the picture which is why I chose this one. I am also keeping the table, but if I had known the colors were not there, I would have selected the option that offered dark slate as it was several dollar cheaper. This table is heavy and the wood is simply beautiful. Assembly took 10 minutes from taking it out of the box to putting it together. It's a great addition to my great-room.
customer_reviews.author: Judith T.

customer_reviews.title: Although the table is sturdy, the photo on Amazon is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Although the table is sturdy, the photo on Amazon is deceiving. The wood is a darker grain that expected and the slate is really dark grey rather than colorful. I purchased the table because of the excellent reviews from others but ended up a little disappointed. The table is very sturdy and seems like it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: StrayGlass

customer_reviews.title: Mancave table!!...also a great leather recliner table!
customer_reviews.text: Great table and as described. Fits perfectly between two leather recliners. Took about 10 mins to assemble and the packaging was very good. For the price it is a good value. I'm not sure what some other reviewers are complaining about when it comes to quality and the slate inset...it's a $100 table...it's not a $1000 table...and I'm very happy with it. I actually like the way the slate is...I don't stare at the slate when I look at the table...it adds depth and makes the table look more rustic. Perfect for me and perfect for my mancave. Anyway, I'm now considering the small hallway table that matches this....
customer_reviews.author: TerryK

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this table, it is solid wood, heavy and very sturdy! It was very easy to put together, from start to finish under a 1/2 hour. It arrived by UPS, I was pleasantly surprised how securely it was packaged...with heavy duty reinforced corners on the box and lots of Styrofoam packing material all around the table. Had 2 bolts that I had a bit of trouble with, but nothing that a little candle wax couldn't fix! Definitely a 5 star purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mabel11

customer_reviews.title: Fine, don't expect coloration in the slate
customer_reviews.text: Quick to put together, heavier wood product. The slate colors on mine are boring, very grey toned and not much variation, so that was a big disappointment. Overall it looks OK, like something you'd find at Target. Not great quality but better than IKEA. Nothing special about it but it works to put next to a chair. Appreciate the height. Cat likes the lower shelf. :-)
customer_reviews.author: D O

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! This end table is beautiful only took about 10 minutes to assemble. It came very well packed..very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Webster

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PLANT STAND
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these tables (ordered 2). Wanted them to put plants on when I bring them in this fall. The tables look expensive, are real wood, easy to put together and the perfect height for my windows in the kitchen. The tables are narrow enough to give me much needed room without taking up a ton of space while looking fabulous!! LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hills

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: 1. For the price, this is great! It’s heavy, solid and almost well made 2. If you’re willing to spend this little on a coffee table, your expectations are simple. You’ll be pleased. It’s solid and sturdy. 3. It’s small. 4. The wood staining on our top was incredibly flawed, uneven, poorly done. For this price, we don’t care. You need lots of light and attention to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured but cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute sturdy table BUT, the slate tiles are disappointing. They are all a uniform dark gray which is not as pictured. The picture shows really pretty color variations. Also, it is made of dark wood, not medium. I kept the table anyway since the mission style matches our decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ammerman

customer_reviews.title: Love Leick furniture!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little stand and typical Leick Furniture. I have several pieces now and have loved them all. They are great pieces of furniture that look far more expensive than they are and are incredibly easy to put together. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it had a strong odor that none of the other pieces had. It faded after a while and is still a beautiful table. Just be aware that it will take a few days for the smell to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry N

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice item and I suppose that most of the items in this collection are of comparable quality. The assembly is very simple and the needed hex wrench is provided. Please note that the flat washers tend to stick together and it's easy to put two of them at the same place. No extra are provided, so pay attention... I like the little table and believe that you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Rustic Slate Hall Stand More Than Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This piece is a bit smaller than I realized it would be, but that's on me. I checked the measurements on my trusty tape measure, before I ordered. The quality is pretty remarkable for the price. I put it together in about 1/2 hour and I'm not usually confident about assembly. I love the way it looks. I have my wifi box with antenna (hiding) on the lower shelf. Thinking about saving to purchase a table to use as a tv stand from the same collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie L

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleased with this purchase! The quality is first rate right down to the packaging. The table is well made with attention to detail. It was very simple to assemble and the finished product is sturdy and beautiful! It is exactly the size and color I had expected and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deezigns

customer_reviews.title: Leik Oak Chairside End Table and matching Slate Tile Recliner solved our problem with limited space for furniture.
customer_reviews.text: We need small side tables for our winter home in Arizona. We have a large great room but the amount of space we have for living room furniture is smaller than it looks because we have doors and walkways that limit the size. We searched and searched for small oak end tables in every furniture store in our area but found nothing suitable. Then we looked on Amazon and found exactly what we needed at a very reasonable price. Leick makes well made furniture and we are thrilled that we finally found both an end table and a the matching V shaped table. We love the way they fit into our small living room area!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to assemble, beautiful, and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love my new coffee/cocktail table. I assembled it with ease. The wooden pieces are each well-crafted, and the table itself is very solid and sturdy. The slate accents are tight and quite beautiful. There is lots of room on the lower shelf for stacks of coffee table books, which I've kept on a shelf for years. Not only did few guests look at them, but I no longer have that shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Greenapple

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece of Furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous slate tiles! I love this rustic table and lamp. The shade is covered with high-quality burlap. It's narrow which is perfect at the end of long sectional. The swing arm and metal pole are well-made and very convenient. The assembly instructions were not detailed but easy enough to figure out. A side note, I loved the shade so much I called Leick and ordered one for a pole lamp I purchased. Their customer service department was extremely helpful and nice. I highly recommend this table and lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table because I had a smaller version of it in a corner by a stuffed chair and loved it. This table matches the smaller one but the two back legs were about a half inch shorter than the two front ones. I decided to place pads under the shorter ones instead of taking it apart and sending it back. The pads worked ok. The table is very nice looking and functional.
customer_reviews.author: D. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It'll do for now
customer_reviews.text: I actually expected real slate trim (which I have seen) and a lighter tone finish. I guess I expected too much for the price point, but it's not so bad that I will bother to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Willy Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lamp table
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a side table with an attached lamp and just couldn't find one that struck my interest like this one did. The product description was accurate. There is some assembly required, which was easy with the instructions provided. This lamp table is sturdy, nice looking and I am so glad I finally found it for our home!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri M Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, solid and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these types of tables the I ordered in repeat orders. Obviously I liked them. It's a quality product for a reasonable price. Sturdy, nice looking tables. Repeatability of the tables ordered at different times is excellent, all 4 look the same. Material is solid wood, not engineered materials. The slate unremarkable, but not distracting.
customer_reviews.author: vectorlogic

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and easy to assemble. There was a small area ( nickel-sized) on the top surface where the finish is scraped off but it is on one corner so I kept it. Other than that small issue, these are sturdy well made tables for the price. Amazon's price was $60 less than Target's so that's even better. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Solid
customer_reviews.text: Wrote two other reviews of this pieces counterparts. It’s well made, sturdy and solid. Matches staring and tile with the other pieces purchased. Could have adjustable adjustable furniture glides on the legs for leveling, I’ll modify it myself. Packaging was good no damage to the box or contents.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Shoppers, Read the 1 star reviews!
customer_reviews.text: This console table was to be used for my 12 pound cat to watch the birds from the window. Listen, people, to the reviews that said that the hardware does not match! I'm mechanical, but this wasn't. Further, the holes drilled for the shelf were on the outside of the legs (not the inside of the legs where they were supposed to be). The shelf was intended for a larger piece than this console table. Its worthless! Completely disappointed and will be returning, as it was expensive. AMAZON, again, this is where listing the country of origin is important. If I knew it was from China, I wouldn't have ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love the style but not the workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture looks gorgeous, but it is definitely not sturdy I don't know how many times we've had to turn it upside down to try and fix the legs. Although I would love to have another one for the style, I can't bring myself to buy it because of the issues trying to keep it together..
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great end Table
customer_reviews.text: Easily constructed end tables that fit great along side furniture. However, in terms of randomness of the slate I too have to agree with some of the other reviews. It's not that random of a color. It's more uniform and dark. If you look at some of the other pictures that this table has you will see a more accurate depiction of the color. However, I believe for the price someone looking to buy will be expecting that exact first image that is displayed. At the very least an option of the exact slate that is going to be in your bedside table should be available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE perfect table for small spaces!!
customer_reviews.text: We had to rearrange our living room to accommodate a recliner needed for my upcoming shoulder surgery. Because of this, we had to move one of our big, square end tables, thus losing table space for our lamp, etc. This table was the perfect fit for the small, rectangle space between our couch and recliner! I highly recommend! It is sturdy and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K. Holding

customer_reviews.title: Amazon doesn't inspect returned items before placing them back on the shelf for sale
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy with Amazon. I purchased this item at a discount because it had been returned. Unfortunately, Amazon doesn't inspect returned items. Had they, they would have discovered that the manufacturer had drilled the peg holes on the outside of the legs as opposed to the inside making it impossible to install the shelf. This wouldn't be such a huge inconvenience for me if I didn't live in a townhome and had to carry this heavy, wood coffee table up two flights of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: REAL WOOD!
customer_reviews.text: REAL WOOD! The entire stand is made out of wood. No "wood products" or "pressboard". It takes 2 people to put it together. (the legs need to be held in place while being screwed in). It is very sturdy and the finish is nice. The decorative inlay is a nice touch. It looks like a more expensive piece. Good Price, Nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged - Easy to assemble- Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lamp. Hard wood with veneer. It should last. One of the better 3 way lamps at this price point. There are some cheaper ones out there, but spend a little extra to buy this one. I am ordering a second one. Don't forget to buy 3 way led bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: I already had an entertainment center with slate inserts. This Leick 10060 Rustic Oak Chairside End Table was a perfect match for my decor. With or without the slate insert entertainment center this end table is a real "STUNNER". You can expect repeated compliments. By the way it is easy to assemble and extremely sturdy. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShopperGuy

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust photo
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this table is about what I expected, but it is darker than I thought it would be from the photo and the slate inserts aren't nearly as varied in color as the photo showed. My table showed up with almost all the inserts being a brownish color, no grays or blues in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, beautiful dark finish
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful in a small space in my dining room. Solid wood, beautiful dark finish. I was worried it might be too reddish, like the "russet" color in many of Leick furniture products. The slate may or may not be real but it looks very nice. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of quality furniture for the $$$s
customer_reviews.text: This wedge shape table is awesome. Finally found a table that provides ample surface area and tucks into a weird space. Quality of material is very good, dense and ridged. Manufacturing tolerances are tight and allow easy assembly. Slate is multicolored, but muted compared to the picture, but consistent with mother nature.
customer_reviews.author: vectorlogic

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Mission Style Console Table
customer_reviews.text: This table I assembled took me about 20 minutes. All the parts included and no hardware missing. It is smaller than I expected, but that is fine. This is not an heirloom piece (made in PRC), but a simple and well suited table for a space that is alongside my door entry. Our home is a Craftsman Style home with Mission Style elements, so red-toned wood and natural stone tiles work very well in the house. I recommend this table as a simple additional point to accent your home.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Q

customer_reviews.title: love this table lamp!
customer_reviews.text: would have given 5 stars except a bit tough to put together..but once I figured out that top piece screws right into base of lamp second one went a lot easier..looks beautiful! Im a senior citizen and I put it together by myself..
customer_reviews.author: rober

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful table! We purchased a bedroom suite from Oak ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table! We purchased a bedroom suite from Oak Express that was a oak/slate combination. We wanted to have a nightstand on both sides of the bed, but didn't have the room. I decided to search for a nightstand in oak/slate, and this piece came up. So, I now have a nightstand that looks like it was part of the suite. This table was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: CFD

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! It was the perfect size and height for my bathroom. The brown wood matches perfectly with my decor. It does look like an expensive piece of furniture and the slate on my table was gray, blue and silver - perfect for my color scheme!
customer_reviews.author: Coach Shay

customer_reviews.title: Leick 10060 Rustic Oak End Table in Front of the HDTV!
customer_reviews.text: Good one for either side of a new Lazy Boy Reclining Leather Couch. They fit the space requirements of our viewing are and provide a nice shelf for both ends of the Lazy-Boy... Recommended as they were extremely easy to set up, yet once done they are sturdy, and very attractive pieces of furniture..
customer_reviews.author: Wigwam

customer_reviews.title: she loves her table.
customer_reviews.text: I took my mother to a major furniture store to shop for a coffee table and saw a few that looked similar to this for almost double the price. I took a chance and bought it here and was very happy with the quality. My mother who is quite picky loves this table and always tells me when I come over how much she loves her table.
customer_reviews.author: KSM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to actually receive the slate ornamentation That was supposed to be part of the top as shown in the photo I am lacking the slate inlays on my table!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It blends well with my other furniture and the legs were super easy to put on. I put baskets on the shelf to hold chargers and electronic items in the larger basket and a smaller basket holds other items. I also like the size and finish. .
customer_reviews.author: Albertine Perrier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and works quite well for my recliner.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this table is very substantial. It appears to be made of wood and it is heavy. It was easy to put together and arrived in perfect condition. It fits nicely in a space between a couch and recliner. I am looking at other pieces of Leick tables. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Belair

customer_reviews.title: Handsome coffee table
customer_reviews.text: We like the coffee table very much. It's sturdy and pretty and not too big for our living room. Looks exactly like the picture. Easy assembly. Perfect for magazines, desserts, or playing games with the grandkids. Price is very fair.
customer_reviews.author: Framma L

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and Great  Clear Image
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely sturdy and real wood. It makes a great entry table for my apartment. Easy assembly and arrived in great shape. The box was not damaged and it took all of 15 minutes to assemble. So glad about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: slowneasy

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have purchased various Leick products over the past 6-7 years. Every piece has been exceptional, including this one. That’s why we keep coming back. Leick products are Extremely well made, sturdy, and beautiful. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C. Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Nicely narrow
customer_reviews.text: This table fit perfectly where I needed it to go, and is nicely sturdy. Assembly was a breeze. My only issue is that the finish was darker than I had expected. It still works for me, but that was a tiny bit of disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Diane McHutchison

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Table is solid construction, however the color is much darker than the picture. Table has a wobble....no matter how much I try to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: NYFashioner27

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured- received 3 panels on the side of wedge table . Not four panels like it's shown in the picture.The slate looks nothing like the photos. It's very disappointing. I was hoping for the gray/black colors. Got a boring khaki slate.
customer_reviews.author: bluedragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Really sweet little chairside table
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY easy to assemble. Very sturdy and well made. Packaged very well. I mean, an elephant would have to sit on the box to have broken it. It has a very pretty, antique-look to it. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Key

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the finish of this item
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the finish of this item. The metal rod/lamp portion of this item is rusted - heavy rust - from the base all the way up to the bulb support. I didn't purchase a Leick item with the thought I would have to sand down the lamp support, and repaint it. The weight of the arm is substantial and of good quality, but I don't know how it developed this level of rust without being noticed when it was packaged for shipment. It was Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Taterbug

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much and it complements my New Mexico, somewhat rustic, interior perfectly. Was hesitant because it comes from China and had to be assembled but it was easy to assemble in a half hour and the wood quality is excellent. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: EJN3rd

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Very Nice Appearance
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this small piece of furniture (be sure to check the size before purchase). It is a kit that puts together very easily and when complete is solid and attractive. The slate may or may not be real, but it looks real! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Allessio77

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coffee table.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the coffee table and liked it so much, we bought the end tables to complete the set. We bought the three because they're small pieces, and we live in a single-wide and need all the space we can get. All are very attractive pieces, assembly required which was a two-person job, but worth the effort - we paid a great price for something we'd pay twice as much for at a furniture store. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip B. Panczuk

customer_reviews.title: good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: For a not top grade piece of furniture this little table light works fine for me. It was easy to put together.. and serves its purpose as a chair next to my easy boy. All in all it seems like a good deal..
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great look--for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very attractive solid piece of furniture. No pressed board--this is solid wood. It was easy to put together and looks great. The slate inserts may not look like the picture, but they are still very attractive and make it look like a much more expensive table. I am so impressed I'm looking at a couple of the companion pieces for the future.
customer_reviews.author: elcy

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was made in America which it is not. While it is a nice looking piece of furniture there are small holes on it in several places which I am concerned could have an effect on the long term durability. I just put it together so I can't say yet how long it will last. I do love the character it has and hope that it will last me for many years.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: TABLE IN A BOX
customer_reviews.text: This is actually m 2nd table from this company. I was so impressed by the first one, I purchased this odd shaped table to go between 2 swivel rocker recliners. Perfect fit. Love the quality if these tables.
customer_reviews.author: CAMPFIRESKY

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table. I needed something next to my recliner and this fit the bill. Very sturdy and good looking. Somewhere I read that it was made in the USA but there are stickers all over the box and table made in China. The company that ships it is in Wisconsin. I would buy more from this company if i need more tables.
customer_reviews.author: K. Orbesen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, elegant, simple Classy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early. Took 20 minutes to put together. Easy. Just go slowly. Very nice addition to livingroom. Love the bottom shelf. Almost perfect except for slight edge flaw on one side. Barely noticable but took off one star.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Too tall, so measure in advance
customer_reviews.text: We bought the coffee table and TV cabinet to go with this and realized that it was too tall for our couch. Be sure to measure height before you buy. Nevertheless, we loved it so much we decided to keep them. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KellyCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Solid and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to assemble and it it very solid. I've received several compliments on how it looks - it definitely looks like it cost a lot more than it did. It's very solid! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it had a pretty strong chemical smell that took about a month to go away.
customer_reviews.author: flutterby4x

customer_reviews.title: Too tall but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We bought the coffee table and TV cabinet to go with this and realized that it was too tall for our couch. Be sure to measure height before you buy. Nevertheless, we loved it so much we decided to keep them. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KellyCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Good Table For The Money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. For the price, this is a good quality table. Thick wood and sturdily built. Quick and easy to assemble. There were a couple of very small blemishes in the finish of mine, but not enough to be noticeable or make a fuss. Good table for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Luggs

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It is so nicely made. The wood is beautiful. There were no flaws and it was easy to put together. I was very satisfied with its superior quality. (The slate insets were not as colorful as featured, but that was okay.)
customer_reviews.author: sue27r

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a lakehouse
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty tables. The slate on the sides matches my slate floors and they are the perfect size for the narrow area in my family room. I liked them so much I ordered a 3rd. Wood is beautiful. Great size for my lamp, the phone, and a coaster for my coffee. Bottom shelf works for my books and a photo frame. Looks great in our lakehouse.
customer_reviews.author: ColvinFamily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tables.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps and tables are beautiful. Very well packaged, and very easy to assemble. The quality is outstanding. We are extremely pleased. With three way light switch’s makes setting mood easy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition - quality furmiture!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new townhouse and needed a small, narrow table that would coordinate with our existing decor. I came across this hall stand, which is the perfect size, and matches my coffee table! It was packed well, so there were no scratches or dings, very easy to assemble, and very sturdy. I am extremely happy with this table!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Don't spend the money
customer_reviews.text: It is not real wood, it's pressboard. It is also made in china. The slate is not pretty colors, I can't detect any color except maybe black and I'm thinking it's not slate at all, doesn't feel like and slate doesn't bend. The only good thing is how easy it is to put together and it's sturdy but if I had known it was that cheap press board, I wouldn't have paid close to 200.00 for it.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put into the space between my husbands recliner and the wall. The wedge shape fits perfectly, and my husband loves it. He puts his laptop and remotes on it. Whoever came up with the wedge shape is a genius! We had a rectangular shaped table there before and it was ill-fitting and awkward. This table was easy to assemble and is solid and sturdy. Also very pretty!! Love the inlaid tiles around the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bedwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little side table. It's nice because it's not too big. It's in front of a window and the old table was too big and would crush the bottoms of the curtains against the wall. This one is narrow so there's room behind it. Plenty of room on the top for the air purifier too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Creed

customer_reviews.title: Love this table's fit between our recliners!
customer_reviews.text: OMG..Just got our chairside table with slate inserts! My husband was amazed to see how great the table was packed. Fantastic. Easy to assemble. Very well made. Sturdt. Beautiful. Plenty of room for a reading lamp. We had priced..and almost puchased a similar 'Amish made' table at a local Farmers Market. Glad we looked on amazon. Got a better product for 1/2 the price! Love this table!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Wood

customer_reviews.title: smaller solid wood end table
customer_reviews.text: We needed a smaller sized end table for our house. This wedge end table works in the space perfectly, and is a good looking solid wood piece.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Mosier

customer_reviews.title: SLATE TABLE
customer_reviews.text: This table works perfectly in a corner area between a recliner and love seat. just enough room for a lamp towards back of the table and room for remotes, etc. It was easy to put together. I have end tables that have slate on top and since I couldn't find anything like that, this matches quite well with what I have.
customer_reviews.author: country girl

customer_reviews.title: Functional and attractive plus it's oak!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wedge table as a bedside table; it looks great and is super functional. The slate is more black than green/blue which is fine and works with other gray/brown colors in the room. Easy to assemble. Good hardwood piece at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: jdayton

customer_reviews.title: Slate doesn't appear to be slatez?
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wood and easy assembly are worrh the money. The slate doesn't appear to be slate as it scratched on assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Prejean

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and a great-looking table
customer_reviews.text: Assembled the table in about 20 minutes. This looks great. I love the fact that it is almost entirely hard wood. Item is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: My biggest disappointment was stone look insert . I thought it would be something other than cardboard like material ? Where I have the table it is a bit darker so you can’t really see how fake it is. I guess I missed that part in the description. Table is sturdy and was easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Where are the assembly instructions???
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get assembly instructions! Waiting to put it together. Please provide ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Mail-Order Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, heavy, solid wood. Fairly easy assembly. It's quite handsome (I especially like the slate inlay), but a bit smaller than I was anticipating. The under shelf makes up for the small footprint, however. I'm very satisfied. I've ordered the matching end table. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pattie

customer_reviews.title: Does not match picture shown.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product. The colors were not as pictured. The tiles were black and not multi colored as shown. Nice table otherwise but bought it for the colors displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W.

customer_reviews.title: tight spaces and serves a useful purpose. Perhaps best
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough positive, glowing things about this small table. Firstly, it is very well built, both materials and design. It exactly fits those small, tight spaces and serves a useful purpose. Perhaps best, it is well worth the modest price!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece and quality materials!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece and quality materials! Easy to assemble and it arrived on the early end of the expected delivery range
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Himmel

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good value although mine came with a couple of nicks in the wood and the faux granite is easy to scratch off the paper backing.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B Jordan

customer_reviews.title: need screws fast
customer_reviews.text: I am missing 2 screws and thus is for Christmas Please help
customer_reviews.author: kristen Wilson

product_meta.title: Leick Rustic Oak Chairside End Table
product_meta.description: Style Name:RusticThe Leick Rustic Slate Chairside End Table with natural stone details and a comfortable worn finish gives this gem an immediate familiar feeling. Scaled to fit where space is at a premium and designed to make the most of it. A perfect choice between two chairs to set a favorite beverage or a small lamp. The lower shelf is perfect for magazines or a favorite display item. Solid wood construction and hand applied multi step Rustic Oak finish will ensure many years of enjoyment. Add the matching Coffee table and sofa table for a complete living room solution. Simple, knock-down assembly ensures that setting up is a snap. Simply attach the legs and you're done! The table takes up a small space with its 24" W x 12" D x 24" H footprint.
feature_bullets: Made of Solid hardwoods and oak veneers with a hand applied multi-step distressed rustic oak finish
Decorative Running Slate Details add a unique design to the table
Narrow shape makes it perfect for the side of a recliner
Compact footprint for small spaces including condos, apartments, and dorm rooms
Simple, knock-down assembly ensures that setting up is a snap. Simply attach the legs, and you're done!
Dimensions: 24" W x 12" D x 24" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars792 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
